mapper.select: select cp.*, u.nickname from Chat_Participant cp left join User u on cp.user_id = u.user_id where cp.user_id=#{userId} and cp.chat_room_id = #{roomId} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into Chat_Participant (chat_room_id, user_id, role, joined_at) values (#{roomId}, #{userId}, #{role}, now())
mapper.delete: delete from Chat_Participant where user_id = #{userId} and chat_room_id = #{roomId}
